entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom Gavin Newsom, you are a complete hypocrite! You've had CA on lockdown for months over COVID-19, yet you now encourage thousands of protesters to take to the streets in direct violation of your social distancing laws. Now it's suddenly ok? Spikes in COVID-19 are now on you, fool!
